outputs.output_descr:
1.  National and local capacity for monitoring poverty and progress on MDGs strengthened
2.  Poverty reduction Strategy linked to MDGS and integrated into national development planning.
3. Making information and communication technology work for the poor (ICTD)
4.  Reduced risk behaviour with respect to HIV transmission in the population through improved knowledge, access to information and increased participation in the national response against HIV/AIDS.
5.  Delivery of services and commodities and supplies for vulnerable groups (particularly women, youth and PLWHA) optimized through SWACI
6.  Improved capacity to lead and manage the response to HIV/AIDS
7.  Law reform initiatives supported for improved observance of  human rights, gender equality and equal access to justice for PLWHA
